Lumatrix.addColorToPixel|block: Add R: $R G: $G B: $B to pixel at x: $x y: $y
Lumatrix.createWordClock|block: create word clock version $version hour color $hourColor minute color $minuteColor word color $wordColor
Lumatrix.getColorFromPixel|block: Get Color at Pixel x: $x y: $y
Lumatrix.initializeMatrixInterfaceExpert:
initialize LED Matrix Interface (Expert). 
Switch pin $pinSwitchTemp 
Center button pin $pinCenterButtonTemp 
Up button pin $pinUpButtonTemp 
Down button pin $pinDownButtonTemp 
Right button pin $pinRightButtonTemp 
Left button pin $pinLeftButtonTemp
Lumatrix.initializeMatrix|block: initialize Lumatrix with pin $pin and brightness $brightness
Lumatrix.movingImage|block: show moving image on Matrix | $image with color $color and speed $speed in direction $direction
Lumatrix.scrollText|block: scroll text $text with color $color and speed $speed
Lumatrix.setOnePixelRGB|block: set one pixel at | x: $x y: $y to RGB colors | R: $R G: $G B: $B
Lumatrix.setOnePixel|block: set one pixel at x $x y $y to color $color
Lumatrix.showImage|block: show image on Matrix | $image | with color $color || Layer $layer
Lumatrix.subtractColorFromPixel|block: Subtract R: $R G: $G B: $B from pixel at x: $x y: $y
